name: Bounty Hunter
title: Gondar
lore: When the first sun rose, a clan of assassins watched its light chase away the night.

shurikenToss.name: Shuriken Toss
shurikenToss.description: Hurls a shuriken at an enemy, damaging and mini-stunning them. Bounces to Tracked targets.

jinada.name: Jinada
jinada.description: Bounty Hunter's attacks periodically deal critical damage and steal gold from the target.

shadowWalk.name: Shadow Walk
shadowWalk.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and moves faster. His next attack breaks invisibility with bonus damage.

track.name: Track
track.description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting true sight and bonus gold when the target dies.
